name: The Hoyo Cigar Box Guitar #59
description:
If you're looking for the cream of the crop for cigar box guitars.  Look no further!  This CBG is custom from head to toe.  It has a custom made brass tailpiece and a one of a kind pick guard.  The single cole pickup is from a 96" Fender Stratocaster and has a single volume control.  The head and heel veneer, as well as, the bridge is recycled from old engine crates from Japan.  Each piece was plained down and prepped.  The color is 100% original!  The bolt on fretted neck is made of red oak with abalone dot inlay and the nut and saddle are both made of bone.  This CBG has gold Wilkinson Tuners (none of those economy tuners you see on most CBGs).  The action is very good on this CBG!  Great for fret play as well as slide play.  The box is 6 3/4" x 12".   

If you have any questions please feel free to ask.  This CBG ships free within the US! There's a small fee for International customers.

name: SecondHandCBG Guitar Picks
description:
These durable picks will stand up to heavy play.  Easy-to-grip shape and Good looks. You can never have too many of these fantastic picks, so stock up!  Your cigar box guitar will love you for it.

There are 12 picks per order.

name: The Three String Java (left handed)
description:
This 3 string left hander has a red oak neck and fretboard.  It has been stained with an amber tent before the clear coat was applied.  This CBG also has a rosewood headstock and bridge.  The action is perfect for slide and some finger style play.   Just what you want out of a cigar box guitar.  This CBG is loaded with gold Wilkinson tuners.  

----------------------------------

with an acoustic piezo active bridge pickup and humbucker. Please allow 2-3 weeks before shipping.

This guitar ships free within the US and just $40 for international shipping.

options.name: Upgraded Piezo with Pre-amp and controls

name: The Three String Punch
description:
This 3 string guitars is a work of art.  A beautiful Punch box with a custom pick guard specially made for this guitar.  This is truly a one of a kind cigar box guitar.  This CBG is loaded with Wilkinson Gold tuners and matching gold hardware.  It also has a red oak neck and fret board with abalone dot inlay.  The action of the CBG is set to high for easy bottle neck play.  It could also be used for finger style play as well.

The cigar box guitar is amplified by a piezo (under the saddle mount) with a battery pre amped system.  It has both tone and volume slider controls located on the side of the CBG.  

If you have any questions or would like more photos, please contact us.  This guitar is being sold with free shipping within the United States.  If you're not within the US, there will be a small shipping charge.

name: The Six String Ashton
description:
This beautiful six string guitar is a one of a kind just like every SecondHand CBG.  Loaded with a maple bolt on neck and chrome hardware.  This cigar box guitar is bound to turn heads.  This CBG has one humbucker with a single volume control knob.  This guitar is has Wilkinson locking tuners so you donâ€™t ever have to worry about it staying in tune.

This guitar ships free within the USA.
